column5: Just wondering if any other canadians have been denied their order with cabelas because they are "choosing not to ship to Canada at the present time." Thanks

>Just wondering if any other canadians have been denied their >order with cabelas because they are "choosing not to ship to >Canada at the present time." Thanks I wouldn't think so. I was there this past weekend for their spring expo and they were "MORE THAN HAPPY TO TAKE MY CANADIAN CURRENCY" Go to their website and E-mail the customer service and ask them. Hope this is of some help.Alan D
Walter works for Bass Pro Shops.
nonsense. cabelas ships all over the world.
